name: domoja
author: Bruno Chabrier
description: A Typescript framework for home automation

scripts.test: : run test coverage; trap 'tput cnorm' INT; nyc --extension .ts npm run test:only
scripts.test:only: : run test suite once; trap 'tput cnorm' INT; ts-mocha test/**/*.ts $WATCHPARAMS --exit; tput cnorm
scripts.test:watch: : watch running test suite; trap 'tput cnorm' INT; WATCHPARAMS='-w --watch-extensions ts,yml' npm --scripts-prepend-node-path=auto run test:only
scripts.watch: : watch running domoja in demo mode; handler() { kill $PID; exit; } ; trap handler INT; while true; do npm run start$TARGET & PID=$!; inotifywait -q -e modify -e move -e create -e delete -r . @node_modules --exclude 'test|\.git|.*\.yml|bin|\.\#.*|.*~'; killchildren() { for p in $*; do CIDs=$(pgrep -P $p); [ -z $CIDs ] || (killchildren $CIDs; kill $p); done; }; killchildren $PID; done
scripts.watch:config: : watch running domoja; TARGET=:config npm --scripts-prepend-node-path=auto run watch
scripts.coverage: : publish coverage report to coveralls; nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.swagger: : run swagger generation if needed; for f in api/*.ts; do [ ! -f api/swagger.json ] || [ $f -nt api/swagger.json ] && ( npm run swagger:force; break ); done; exit 0
